begin.title: Introduction
begin.description:
Hello, my name is **Gabriel Lobo**, I am **{{age}} years old** and I'm a technology enthusiast. I discovered the world of programming in **2016** through **Arduino**, by reading free e-books online.

Shortly after, I became interested in **Python** and started learning it on my **phone**, since I didn't have a computer.

decision.title: The triad
decision.description: I dedicated myself **exclusively** to Python for a long time, but I thought it was time to move on to **something new**. So I started learning **HTML**, **CSS**, and **JavaScript**, still on my **phone**.

progression.title: Currently
progression.description: Since then, I **continue learning**, focusing mainly on the **React** framework, as well as **exploring** other technologies.
